title: My 2 weeks old Pixel 4 XL boot up with black screen
content:
I have my 2 weeks old Pixel 4 XL. Once I restart the device, the screen went black after the Google logo. Only the time, mobile 
signal and battery logo are shown and blinking at the top of the screen. I attach the video link for demo. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Y8M-Gvpzlk

I tried to hard reset (wipe data) for the device. It looks normal during the setup page. However, the problem happen again once the setup is done and after I press the power button. Here is the video link :
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wfm9sct1j6Q

Anything I can do before I send it for warranty claim?
